page.title: 08Social Concerns
page.content: Social Concern ============== The Malling Citizens' Advice Bureau is situated within the Clout Memorial building in the High Street. It has an office in which are kept numerous files and reference material necessary to deal with the many and diverse queries. The Bureau is open from 10 to 1.00 p.m. Tuesday to Friday and from 10 till 4.00 p.m. on Monday. It is staffed by the organiser and her deputy, who are responsible for the administration, and at present by twelve voluntary workers. Two solicitors also give free advice. Each worker has been appointed and approved by the management committee who are representative of the main local interests. Training has to be undertaken on courses, in-service work and later more specialised work
